game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where memories can be transferred from one person to another, the city of Remembrance is plagued by a mysterious phenomenon known as 'The Devouring', which erases entire lifetimes from existence. Players take on the role of an archaeologist tasked with uncovering the truth behind The Devouring and preserving the memories of humanity.
game.beginning: Protagonist awakens in a desolate alleyway, surrounded by fragmented memories that are not their own. As they begin to piece together their identity, a cryptic message sets them on a quest to find the source of The Devouring.
game.ending: The truth behind The Devouring is revealed: an ancient being known as 'The Echokeeper' seeks to erase humanity's memories in order to protect them from an impending apocalypse. Players must make a choice: preserve the memories and risk extinction, or surrender them and save humanity.
